flawed_nl_solution:
The variety pack costs $40 and rush shipping is an additional 30% so that's 40*0.3 = $12
The variety pack costs $40 and rush shipping is $12 so they will cost 40+12 = $<<40+12=48>>48
The order will cost $48 and he will get 4 types of fancy, sliced meats so each type costs 48/4 = $<<48/4=12>>12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 52, not 48. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
